data.title: Madison Gas and Electric
data.meta_description: Madison Gas and Electric's (MGE) commitment to those we serve extends far beyond reliable energy. Established in 1966, the MGE Foundation is MGE's philanthropic arm.
data.text:
Giving back to our community

Madison Gas and Electric's (MGE) commitment to those we serve extends far beyond reliable energy. Established in 1966, the MGE Foundation is MGE's philanthropic arm. In the last five years, the Foundation has given more than $8.4 million to more than 400 community organizations.

As your community energy company, we are committed to improving the quality of life for all who live and work here. We contribute to and help to better our community in three different ways:

Charitable giving through the MGE Foundation.

Corporate giving by MGE through partnerships, collaborations and projects with local organizations and stakeholders.

Volunteerism and service of our valued employees.
